title: Projects
text:
Advanced disease outbreak modeling using R, SPSS, and CDC data to implement deterministic and continuous time models with the “deSolve” package; evaluated the impact of varying vaccination rates and calculated key metrics (V-critical of 96%) with Tableau.

title: Projects
section: The Impact of HUman Waste Production (HWP) on Pollinator Biodiversity
text:
The Impact of HUman Waste Production (HWP) on Pollinator Biodiversity

Conducted extensive statistical analysis with Excel to explore the link between pollinator biodiversity and HWP—leveraged data from iNaturalist, UCLA Sustainability, Cal Fire, and the Los Angeles Almanac—and expanded scientific knowledge by 40%.
View Full Report (pdf)

title: Welcome, I’m Tracy!
text:
My name is Tracy Anyasi, and I am passionate about leveraging financial and biomedical research to inform strategic decisions in healthcare markets. With a foundation in data-driven analysis, market research, and project management, I aim to translate complex healthcare and financial insights into actionable strategies that enhance patient access, affordability, and market efficiency.


I am particularly motivated by the intersection of private equity and equity research, where rigorous evaluation of healthcare innovations can drive investment decisions while improving societal outcomes. The opportunity to contribute to a team at the forefront of healthcare finance, research, and market accessibility—providing evidence-based, strategic insights that balance financial performance with patient impact—is both exciting and deeply aligned with my professional goals.
